title: Grey Uncle and the Mixed-blood Prince - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Mature   Romance   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adopted Children   Black Belly   Businessmen   Childcare   Cohabitation   Complex Family Relationships   Confinement   Cruel Characters   Different Social Status   Familial Love   F*llatio   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   H*ndjob   Manipulative Characters   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Persistent Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Schemes And Conspiracies   Straight Uke   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests

description: Ding Xiaowei is a busy single father, always rushing about. In order to give his daughter a better life, he took home an injured and hapless, but wealthy-looking man that he picked up at the beach. This person covers all the household duties and amuses the child, besides not being a woman, he seems to be quite perfect. Yet the seemingly peaceful days actually has a turbulent undercurrent, so much that in an instant, nothing remains the same.>
